page.title: 01Medstead Village
page.content:
In Medstead there are 1700 people and about five farms, a church and a school. The church is called St. Andrews church.
There are three shops in the village. In Medstead there are two Greens. One of them has a football pitch and a park and the other has a cricket pitch and the village hall.
Behind the village hall there is a wood. There is an Abbey in Abbey road on the Road to Beech. In Medstead there is an old school and is used for Sunday school. Also there is a railway line which runs from Alton to Alresford via Medstead and Ropley.
